title: ‘We wanted to test each other’: Demi Vollering wins first GC test over Annemiek van Vleuten
content:
Vollering gained eight seconds on Van Vleuten on the road to Rodez, but the toughest tests are still to come for the GC favorites.

Read the full article at ‘We wanted to test each other’: Demi Vollering wins first GC test over Annemiek van Vleuten on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
